title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: dat.atelectasis <- escalc(measure="RR",               ai=c(3, 2, 1, 1, 0),               bi=c(15, 33, 43, 44, 15),               ci=c(4, 6, 4, 2, 1),               di=c(15, 29, 38, 43, 14),               slab=c("Boules et al, 2011",                      "Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021")               )

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
text: Note: standard RE model without Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman (HKSJ) modification identical:
code: fe <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="FE")  forest(fe,         atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) re <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="REML")

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: pm <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="PM")  forest(pm,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pmhk <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

what: Sensitivity analysis: Odds ratios (Paule-Mandel with HKSJ modification)
title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: dat.atelectasis.OR <- escalc(measure="OR",               ai=c(3, 2, 1, 1, 0),               bi=c(15, 33, 43, 44, 15),               ci=c(4, 6, 4, 2, 1),               di=c(15, 29, 38, 43, 14),               slab=c("Boules et al, 2011",                      "Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021")               ) pmhk.OR <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis.OR, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk.OR,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: dat <- escalc(measure="RR",               ai=c(3, 5, 2, 0, 1),               bi=c(32, 39, 43, 15, 24),               ci=c(6, 7, 4, 1, 2),               di=c(29, 35, 41, 14, 23),               slab=c("Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021",                      "Yao et al, 2020"))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
text: Note: standard RE model without Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman (HKSJ) modification identical:
code: fe <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="FE")  forest(fe,         atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) re <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="REML")

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: pm <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="PM")  forest(pm,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: pmhk <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

what: Sensitivity analysis: Odds ratios (Paule-Mandel with HKSJ modification)
title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: dat.OR <- escalc(measure="OR",               ai=c(3, 5, 2, 0, 1),               bi=c(32, 39, 43, 15, 24),               ci=c(6, 7, 4, 1, 2),               di=c(29, 35, 41, 14, 23),               slab=c("Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021",                      "Yao et al, 2020")) pm.OR <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.OR, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pm.OR,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

title: Sensitivity analysis: leave one out
code: dat <- escalc(measure="RR",               ai=c(3, 5, 2, 0, 1),               bi=c(32, 39, 43, 15, 24),               ci=c(6, 7, 4, 1, 2),               di=c(29, 35, 41, 14, 23),               slab=c("Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021",                      "Yao et al, 2020"))  dat.atelectasis <- escalc(measure="RR",               ai=c(3, 2, 1, 1, 0),               bi=c(15, 33, 43, 44, 15),               ci=c(4, 6, 4, 2, 1),               di=c(15, 29, 38, 43, 14),               slab=c("Boules et al, 2011",                      "Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021")               )

title: Sensitivity analysis: leave one out
code: final.pneu.mod <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="PM")  final.atel.mod <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="PM")

title: Sensitivity analysis: leave one out
code: leave1.atel <- leave1out(final.atel.mod) forest.default(x=leave1.atel$estimate, ci.lb=leave1.atel$ci.lb, ci.ub=leave1.atel$ci.ub,                slab=paste("Omitting ", leave1.atel$slab, sep=""),atransf=exp,                at=log(c(0.15, 0.25, exp(final.atel.mod$b), 1, 4)), xlim=log(c(0.01, 4.5)),                refline=final.atel.mod$b               ) lines(x=log(c(1, 1)), y=c(0, 6))

title: Sensitivity analysis: leave one out
code: leave1 <- leave1out(final.pneu.mod) forest.default(x=leave1$estimate, ci.lb=leave1$ci.lb, ci.ub=leave1$ci.ub,                slab=paste("Omitting ", leave1$slab, sep=""),atransf=exp,                at=log(c(0.15, 0.25, exp(final.pneu.mod$b),  1, 4)), xlim=log(c(0.01, 4.5)),                refline=final.pneu.mod$b               ) lines(x=log(c(1, 1)), y=c(0, 6))

title: Sensitivity analysis: leave one out
text: Data unclear: Multiple/range values given tidal volume PEEP values greater zero (dichotomisation zero) Li et al. results split two primary outcome, clear tidal volume etc. sets results.
